data.name: Music Racer 2000
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game

You can play any music files (MP3, Ogg, Flac, Wav) stored on your hard drive or use music from AUDIUS STREAMING or IN-GAME LIBRARY.

This game takes your favorite song and generates a racing track based on it, so you can literally RACE YOUR MUSIC! The shape, speed, and mood of each ride are determined by the song you choose.
data.about_the_game:
You can play any music files (MP3, Ogg, Flac, Wav) stored on your hard drive or use music from AUDIUS STREAMING or IN-GAME LIBRARY.

This game takes your favorite song and generates a racing track based on it, so you can literally RACE YOUR MUSIC! The shape, speed, and mood of each ride are determined by the song you choose.
data.short_description: Music Racer 2000 is a music-adapting racing/runner/action game in an aesthetic retrowave world where you use your music to race your unique cars!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 and above
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 and above
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
